trans-unit.source: Contains data associated with a workflow change that occurs during the execution of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Contiene dati associati a una modifica del flusso di lavoro che si verifica durante l'esecuzione di un'istanza del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] When a workflow change occurs during the execution of a workflow instance and a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associated with the workflow instance includes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> configured for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> event, the runtime tracking infrastructure sets <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> to TrackingWorkflowChangedEventArgs in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> that it sends to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Quando viene apportata una modifica del flusso di lavoro durante l'esecuzione di un'istanza del flusso di lavoro e un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>associata istanza del flusso di lavoro include un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>configurato per il <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>evento, il set di infrastruttura di rilevamento di runtime <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A>a TrackingWorkflowChangedEventArgs nel <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>che invia al servizio di rilevamento.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > TrackingWorkflowChangedEventArgs is used only by the runtime tracking service to pass information in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > TrackingWorkflowChangedEventArgs è utilizzata solo dal servizio di rilevamento di runtime per passare informazioni in un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: Gets the changes that occurred to the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene le modifiche apportate all'istanza del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: A list of <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChangeAction"></xref> objects that specify the changes that occurred to the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Un elenco di <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChangeAction"> </xref> oggetti che specificano le modifiche apportate all'istanza del flusso di lavoro.
Ottiene la definizione del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that represents the root activity of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> che rappresenta l'attività radice dell'istanza del flusso di lavoro.
